workers.name: Joseph Mungai
workers.title: Software Developer
workers.summary: A software developer who designs and builds applications for clients and businesses.
workers.about: Joseph is a full-stack developer with experience in React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. He has worked on multiple client projects in e-commerce, fintech, and logistics.

workers.name: Philip Kamau
workers.title: Plumber
workers.summary: Expert plumber specializing in pipe installation, drainage systems, and emergency repairs.
workers.about: Philip is a certified plumber with over 12 years of experience handling domestic and commercial plumbing systems. He has completed over 350 projects including bathroom installations, drainage repairs, water tank setups, and emergency pipe fixes across Nairobi.

workers.name: Brian Melita
workers.title: Lawyer
workers.summary: Experienced advocate specializing in family law, contracts, and corporate legal advisory.
workers.about: Sarah is an Advocate of the High Court of Kenya with over 8 years of experience in family, corporate, and commercial law. She has represented clients in divorce and child custody matters, drafted contracts for SMEs, and advised startups on compliance and regulatory issues.
services: Legal consultation for startups and SMEs

workers.name: Mary Mwende
workers.title: Electrician
workers.summary: Reliable electrician specializing in wiring, lighting installation, and electrical repairs.
workers.about: Mary is a certified electrician with 2 years of experience in residential and commercial electrical work. She handles wiring installation, lighting setup, circuit repairs, and electrical safety testing.

workers.name: Christine Njoki
workers.title: Mama Fua
workers.summary: Trusted Mama Fua offering laundry, ironing, and deep cleaning services for homes and apartments.
workers.about: Grace is a highly reliable Mama Fua with 6 years of experience providing laundry, ironing, and home cleaning services.

workers.name: Phineas Lesie
workers.title: Boda Boda Rider
workers.summary: Reliable boda boda rider offering fast and safe delivery and transport services.
workers.about: Phineas has 4 years of experience transporting clients and parcels across Meru town. He is known for punctuality, road safety, and excellent customer service.
